text: Kae εberε a Nyankopͻn nam Nkͻmhyεfoͻ no so (ne mo) yεε Apam sε: “Ɛberε a Mama mo Adiyisεm Nwoma ne Adwen yi, na εba sε afei Ɔsomafoͻ a ͻrebedi Nwoma a εwͻ mohͻ no ho adanseε no ba a, mobεgye no adi na moaboa no? Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Mopene so gye M’apam yi tum sε εkyekyere mo?” Wͻ’kaa sε: “Yεpene so”. Na Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Ɛneε moni adanseε, na Menso Mene mo ka wͻn a wͻ’di (saa asεm yi ho) adanseε no ho”
